thread.title: Molly Sims Gives Birth, Welcomes Baby BoyWith Scott Stuber
thread.title_full: Molly Sims Gives Birth, Welcomes Baby BoyWith Scott Stuber

title: Molly Sims Gives Birth, Welcomes Baby BoyWith Scott Stuber
text:
Molly Sims Gives Birth, Welcomes Baby BoyWith Scott Stuber January 11, 2017 @ 5:55 PM By Rachel Paula Abrahamson Molly Sims and Scott Stuber on December 7, 2016 in Westwood, California. Credit: Steve Granitz/WireImage 
He was worth all that morning sickness! Molly Sims and her husband, Scott Stuber, welcomed their third child, a baby boy, on Tuesday, January 10, and couldn't wait to share the happy news with fans. 
"Welcome to the world Grey Douglas Stuber 1.10.17," Sims captioned an adorable image of her toting the newborn. "Words do not express how grateful and happy we are to have another piece of magic added to our little tribe! #blessed #tribeof5." Revisit the Celebrity Babies Born in 2016 
The former model, 43, and the film producer, who wed in September 2011, are already parents of son Brooks, 4, and daughter Scarlett, 21 months. Scott Stuber, Brooks Alan Stuber, Scarlett May Stuber and Molly Sims on July 23, 2016 in Bridgehampton, New York. Kevin Mazur/Getty Images 
The Las Vegas alum and Stuber, 48, weren’t planning to expand their family. But one day when Sims wasn’t feeling well, she decided to take a pregnancy test left over from when she was trying for Scarlett. “I literally did a triple take … then I took five more tests,” she told Us Weekly in September. “That’s what happens when you go visit your husband on a movie set!” A photo posted by Molly Sims (@mollybsims) on Jan 11, 2017 at 2:28pm PST 
Sims announced her pregnancy via Instagram on August 9. “This is happening. This is like our Hail Mary,” the choked-up star said on her official YouTube channel. “This is such a true surprise. I think that’s why I am so emotional.”
